comment: "Sudhanshu bhai kya haal hai? Aur DT bhai kaise ho?" Apni yeh sab hostel corridor wali baatein yaad aayegi. You are a very happy soul and a nice person brother. All the best and wish you achieve what you want in life super soon!
name: Dhruvil Thakkar (DT)
